#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
  int t;
  cin>>t;
  while(t--)
    {
      int n,k;
      string c;
      cin>>n>>k;
      cin>>c;
      
      vector<int> x;
      
      int last = c[0];
      int counter = 0;
      int final = 0;
      int flag = 0;

      //rrrggrrb;k=2
      //      c+=c[c.size()-1];

      for(int i = 0;i<c.size();i++)
	{
	  if(c[i]==last)
	    {	      
	    counter++;
	    }
	  else
	    {
	      x.push_back(counter);
	      last = c[i];
	      counter = 1;
	    }
	}      
      x.push_back(counter);
      
      for(int i = 0;i<x.size();i++)
	{
	  if(x[i]<k)
	    final++;
	  else
	    {
	      flag = 1;
	      while(x[i]>0)
		{
		  final++;
		  x[i]-=k;
		}
	    }
	}

      if(flag==0)
	cout<<"-1\n";
      else
	cout<<final<<endl;
    }

  return 0;
}
